mapper.select: SELECT svd.certissuer, svd.certsubject, svd.certexpiration, svd.keystore, svd.spacsurl , svd.issuer, svd.entityid, svd.audience, svd.validityinterval , svd.nameidformat, svd.encrypted, svd.binding, svd.nameidconvert, svd.signature, svd.digestmethod, svd.metaurl, app.* FROM auth_app_saml_detail svd, auth_app app WHERE app.instid = svd.instid AND app.id = #{value} AND svd.id = #{value} AND svd.id = app.id
